name: E.P. GUIDI, INC., Appellant, v. DEPARTMENT OF GENERAL SERVICES
name_abbreviation: E.P. Guidi, Inc. v. Department of General Services

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE and NIGRO, JJ.
Justice NEWMAN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: E.P. GUIDI, INC., Appellant, v. DEPARTMENT OF GENERAL SERVICES.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
Justice NEWMAN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Edward Seglias, Roy S. Cohen, Philadelphia, for E.P. Guidi, Inc.
Nora Doyle, Jose Morales, Harrisburg, for Comm., Dept, of General Services.
casebody.head_matter:
684 A.2d 119
E.P. GUIDI, INC., Appellant, v. DEPARTMENT OF GENERAL SERVICES.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 16, 1996.
Decided Nov. 8, 1996.
Edward Seglias, Roy S. Cohen, Philadelphia, for E.P. Guidi, Inc.
Nora Doyle, Jose Morales, Harrisburg, for Comm., Dept, of General Services.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE and NIGRO, JJ.
